item.title: CVE-2017-11829|2024-08-05T18:19:39.260Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20windows%2010
item.description: Microsoft Windows 10 allows an elevation of privilege vulnerability when the Windows Update Delivery Optimization does not properly enforce file share permissions.
